[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1550977359558{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”SERVICES” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”30″ equal_height=”yes” el_id=”group-instruction”][vc_column width=”7/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”GROUP INSTRUCTION” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%23143c52″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]We work with our clients to create training programs that align with their goals. Each program is designed with specific objectives  so that learning outcomes can be measured and programs effectiveness can be evaluated. All of our trainings are dynamic, interactive and engaging. We don’t do boring!

Group training topics includes, but are not limited to:

  • Enhancing Executive Presence.
  • Presenting with Impact.
  • Conducting Candid Conversations.
  • Defusing Tense Situations.
  • Improving Interpersonal Effectiveness.
  • Dealing with difficult Personalities.
  • Building Effective Teams.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1550975362736{background-image: url(http://speakandwriteclearly.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/shutterstock_178715825-small-square.png?id=286) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”120px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”30″ equal_height=”yes” el_id=”individualized-coaching”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1550975279757{background-image: url(http://speakandwriteclearly.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/shutterstock_218537689_small_square.png?id=285) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”120px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_custom_heading text=”INDIVIDUALIZED COACHING” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%23143c52″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Through our coaching engagements, we work with emerging and established leaders to improve leadership and communication skills. We believe that everyone can make long-lasting change and understand that it can be challenging to do so on your own. We partner with you to provide support, motivation and accountability to help you reach your goals.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”30″ equal_height=”yes” el_id=”facilitation”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_custom_heading text=”FACILITATION” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%23143c52″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Working in teams can be exhilarating, rewarding, and often very challenging. When your group needs to make crucial decisions or achieve specific goals, it can be helpful to bring in a skilled and neutral facilitator to improve the group’s efficacy.

We can transform any group meeting from boring, or even dysfunctional, to engaging and productive.  We will work with you to understand your goals and the best way to reach them. Whether it is a board meeting, focus group, or everyday working team meeting, let Speak and Write Clearly energize the group experience and help your team reach its potential.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1550975452095{background-image: url(http://speakandwriteclearly.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/shutterstock_555085486-small-square.png?id=287) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”120px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”30″ equal_height=”yes” el_id=”keynote-conference-prep”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1550975524708{background-image: url(http://speakandwriteclearly.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/shutterstock_162536930-small-square.png?id=288) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”120px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_custom_heading text=”KEYNOTE AND CONFERENCE PREP” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%23143c52″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Is your organization hosting a conference or sending speakers to one? If you want to ensure that your organization’s spokespeople can effectively represent your company, let Speak and Write Clearly prepare them to do so. We help individuals craft and deliver their presentations with confidence, credibility and charisma.

Our Keynote and Conference Prep Program provides speakers with both the skills and the confidence needed to engage any size audience. We customize our programs to meet the needs of the organization, whether it is preparing in-person or remotely with groups or individuals.

We will help refine the presenters’ content and sharpen their delivery so that your conference is the only place that the audience and the speakers want to be![/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1548339889496{background-color: #263c61 !important;}”][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”Let Us Help You achieve Your Organizational and Individual Goals.” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_btn title=”CONTACT US” shape=”square” align=”right” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fspeakandwriteclearly.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|||”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
